name: Sword Survival
description:
Sword Survival is a 2D platformer game where you kill monsters with many combo attacks to survive.

Controls:

  • Movement: Arrow keys
  • Attack: Space-bar
  • Jump: Up-Arrow key

Combo attacks:

  • Upper-cut: Down-arrow key + attack
  • Triple-cut: Hold space-bar
  • Tornado-cut: attack while in air
  • Slicer: jump + left or right arrow key + attack
  • Roller: Attack about 2 seconds after moving without jumping 
  • Smash-down: Down-arrow key while in air

Tips: 

  1. Player regenerates a little bit after completion of each wave
  2. It's important to not get damaged in order to prepare for next waves which are progressively difficult.
  3. While doing the Roller attack, player is invincible.
  4. Smash-down attack does more damage and knock-back if the player is higher in air.
  5. Slicer attack and Roller attack can be great escape tools.
  6. Triple-cut does 3 sequential attacks that get stronger.
